Job Description

Data Scientist Security

The Data Scientist in Security will deliver industry-leading analytics solutions that protect PepsiCo information and assets globally against unauthorized access, security risks, data loss, and cyber attacks.

This role will design and develop data models using machine learning to solve key security problems, and help mature PepsiCo's security analytics strategy, partnering with PepsiCo stakeholders across all organizational levels to implement and manage a portfolio of security analytics platforms. The Data Scientist will have strong analytical and communication skills, fostering relationships across organizations and serving as a key Security Engineering point of contact.


Responsibilities:
  • Delivers large, complex long-term analytics driven projects involving multiple technologies and vendors with broad implications for the IT architecture
  • In partnership with security analysts and incident response teams, develops strategies and actionable plans for enablement and continuous improvement of security analytics capabilities
  • Develops tactical plans for security analytics and detection solutions
  • As a subject matter expert, influences technology solutions to maximize threat detection benefit while adhering to secure design principles and utilizing PepsiCo methodology, best practices and policies
  • Stays current with the industry, security standards/best practices and relevant industry trends
  • Determines, tracks and monitors key metrics to mitigate risks to PepsiCo and remediates when necessary
    • Qualifications/Requirements

    Education:
  • Bachelors degree in Computer Science, Statistics or related fields; Masters degree preferred
    • Experience:
  • Four or more years of data analytics experience
  • Proficiency in at least one of the following programming languages: Python, R, Java or Scala
  • Experience with machine learning toolkits such as Scikit-learn and Weka
  • Experience with big data frameworks such as Hadoop and Spark
  • Two or more years of experience in Information Security preferred
  • Strong analytical and communication skills
  • Demonstrated effectiveness working across multiple business units to achieve results
